paths.songDirectories_tooltip: Directories where all your local music is stored
paths.songDirectories_exclude_tooltip: Songs in these directories would not be scanned
paths.artworkPath_tooltip: Directory where downloaded artworks are stored
paths.thumbnailPath_tooltip: Directory where generated thumbnails are stored
paths.splitter_tooltip: Regex to split artist names. Leave empty to disable splitting.
paths.scan_interval_tooltip: Interval in minutes to trigger a scan task. Set to -1 to disable automatic scanning
paths.scan_threads_tooltip: Number of threads to use when scanning for local music

newTheme.name: Theme Name
newTheme.author: Author
newTheme.colors_tooltip: Change the colors to customise UI

systemSettings.title: System Settings
systemSettings.lastLoadedPlaybackState: Load last playback state on startup

system.systemSettings_tooltip: Settings which are related to your system

audioSettings.title: Audio Settings
audioSettings.gaplessPlayback: Use gapless playback for wherever possible
audioSettings.sponsorBlock: Use SponsorBlock to automatically skip to highlighted part of Youtube song

system.audioSettings_tooltip: Settings which are related audio playback
system.gapless_skip_tooltip: Forcefully switches to next song (seconds) before the current song ends
system.invidiousUrlUnsupported: This url does not support Invidious API
system.invidious_tooltip: Invidious instance to use instead of youtube
system.zoom_tooltip: Zoom of windows in percentage. This may break the UI.

spotify.client_id_tooltip: Spotify client ID required to login to Spotify. Click to know more
spotify.client_secret_tooltip: Spotify client Secret required to login to Spotify. Click to know more
spotify.autoFetchDisclaimer: A window will now open where you will be asked to login to your Spotify account. After logging in please do not click anywhere as the whole process will be automated
spotify.title: Spotify Settings
spotify.tooltip: Options to change the behavior of spotify playback
spotify.username_tooltip: Your spotify username. Usually your email
spotify.password_tooltip: Your spotify password. You may need to set one in settings on Spotify

librespot.title: Librespot options
librespot.tooltip: Options to change the behavior of librespot
librespot.useSpotifyCanvas: Show spotify canvas video in background

youtube.client_id_tooltip: Youtube client ID required to login to Youtube. Click to know more
youtube.client_secret_tooltip: Youtube client Secret required to login to Youtube. Click to know more

youtubeAlternative.title: Youtube Alternative services
youtubeAlternative.tooltip: Get data from Youtube through a 3rd party provider

piped.url_tooltip: URL of Piped instance to use
piped.username_tooltip: Your piped username at the selected instance
piped.password_tooltip: Your piped password at the selected instance

invidious.url_tooltip: URL of Invidious instance to use
invidious.options_tooltip: Options to fine control Invidious playback
invidious.always_proxy: Always play audio from Invidious proxy instead of Google video

youtube.options_tooltip: Options to fine control Youtube playback
youtube.useEmbeds: Use Youtube embeds for playing audio from Youtube

system.language_tooltip: Change the language of the interface
system.clear_preferences: Are you sure you want to reset everything to default? The app will restart after you reset.

jukebox.pin_tooltip: This pin will be required to exit Jukebox Mode. Should be numeric.
jukebox.optionalFields_tooltip: Toggle optional buttons to show in Jukebox mode

lyrics.title: Lyrics providers
lyrics.tooltip: Select which lyrics providers to use to search for lyrics

queueSettings.title: Queue Settings
queueSettings.tooltip: Options to tweak the behavior of song queue
queueSettings.clearQueue: Clear queue before adding playing a playlist

provider_toggle.title: Scrobble whitelist
provider_toggle.tooltip: Enable providers whose songs you want to be scrobble'd

volumePersistMode.title: Volume behavior
volumePersistMode.tooltip: Change the way volume slider behaves
volumePersistMode.persistSeparateVolumes: Remember separate volume for each provider
volumePersistMode.persistClampVolume: Manually adjust volume range for each provider
